definition: to lead a quiet and peaceful life in retirement/to stay home with nothing to do/to lead a solitary life
enclosure/(variant of 閒|闲[xian2]) idle/unoccupied/leisure
idle/unoccupied/leisure
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
surname Ju

sentences.english: Dismissal homebound three more than ten years of poetry husband amused.
sentences.chinese: 罢官闲居三十余载，以诗丈自娱。

sentences.english: After she retired, she lived in leisure at home.
After the end of her career, she lives in leisure at home.
sentences.chinese: 结束了职业生涯后，她闲居在家。

sentences.english: He is kicking his heel, as my father would say.
sentences.chinese: 用我父亲的话说，他在闲居。

sentences.english: Does the shop open at 9 feel on weekdays?
sentences.chinese: 这家店闲居是早上9点开门吗？
